```{r setup}
library(CSICalc)
```

```{r}

Nneg = 15845
X = c(58+11)

mu = c(130)
cilow = c(118)
cihigh = c(142)
est.inc = X/(mu/365)/Nneg * 100
library("CSICalc")
results = estimate_incidence(
    mu_estimates = mu,
    mu_CIs_lower = cilow,
    mu_CIs_upper = cihigh,
    X = X,
    N = rep(Nneg, 3),
    gamma_shape_range = c(0,1000))

round(results[, 15:16], 2)

```
